fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Twice per game at night ; Publicly annouce at the start of the day a crook (4961) will be visiting a player of your choice's house tonight
Eg:
(at start of day two)
*a crook (4961) will be visiting rasen's house tonight!*

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-  You will visit the target
- If a non town member also visits the target; they will be dealt a powerful attack

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Town loses (you dont need to be alive)
